        public boolean send(java.lang.String event1,
           java.lang.String event2,
           Transmittable data)
        Basic method to send an event and an object that can be serialized into basic data types and back again.
        Parameters:
        event - predefined event that is shared knowledge between both PcComm and EV3Comm
        data - an object which can be turned into basic data types, sent through dos and turned back into an object.
        Returns:

      • shutdown

        Parameters:
        data - the object which data will be written to
        Returns:
        true if there was no problem reading the data
